statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@domain.com';
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'draft' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_behavior_table WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' AND behavior_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE campaign_id = 2 AND customer_id = 5;
DELETE FROM campaign_stats WHERE open_rate > 0.5 OR click_rate > 0.3
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
